header.title: A heartwarming Wedding movie<1 />about You and Your loved ones

aboutMePage.title: Each story and couple is unique to me, and I strive to reflect that in each wedding movie by thoughtfully selecting music and structuring the film.
aboutMePage.main: <1>Hi, I am Alena.</1><1>I`m a wedding videographer who aims to capture more than just staged shots of a love story.</1><1>In my movies, you will not find long, slowed shots of the wedding dress or rings, or old fashioned love story shots. Instead, you will see a beautifully captured story of the day, with lots of moments featuring your guests spending time together.</1>

contactMePage.title: If you like my approach and movies, <1 /> I would be glad to meet you!
contactMePage.subTitle: Get in touch with me
contactMePage.name: Name
contactMePage.secondTitle: I will get back to you within 24 hours <1 /> and send you my proposal

thankYou.title: Thank you!<1 /> I will contact you very soon.
thankYou.secondTitle: I eagerly anticipate hearing from you and learning about your upcoming wedding. <1 /> I will reach out to you within 24 hours. <1 /> Please ensure you check your spam folder if you do not hear back from me within a couple of days.
